title: DC, can't reconnect, can't login?
body: dc'd in game (which literally does not happen to me) and i exited (which i never do) to try and reconnect, could not, restarted client, now i can't login. NA server pls help wtf? i see similar problems on boards so i'm hoping it's not just me....

replies.body:
Hey everyone, we're aware of the issue. It appears to be an outage or change on Comcast's end. We're seeing if there are any changes we can make on our end to work around it.

Could you please help us out by doing a traceroute to the two addresses below? Post it here, but do not post your IP address.

* lq.na1.lol.riotgames.com
* prod.na1.lol.riotgames.com

Instructions on doing a trace route are here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2

Comcast customer here.

**lq.na1.lol.riotgames.com: 
**
Uh oh!

The Merch Store is temporarily unavailable as we resolve some technical issues.
Connection timed out

The initial connection between CloudFlare's network and the origin web server timed out. As a result, the web page can not be displayed.

Ray ID: 246d609a3df00166
Your IP address: 
Error reference number: 522
CloudFlare Location: Chicago

**http://prod.na1.lol.riotgames.com**/: Just says "This web page is not availabe"
Thanks for the response, but we're looking for a traceroute. You can find directions here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2

is the traceroute still helpful at this point in time? i'm now able to log in to League, and i've been away from the computer for a bit so whatever issue may have been occuring could be resolved by now. happy to post it if it's still useful!
Hopefully it's resolved for all now, but it couldn't hurt to post if you've still got it handy.
what i mean is i didn't do one before cause i don't know about computer things, so should i do one now and post it or will it not matter because the thing is fixed. i'm bad at computers, mr bark
Haha, don't worry about it then. Sounds like we need to keep you away from the command line. :-P
HAHA YEAH TOTALLY (casually pretends he knows what that means)
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
actually it's happening again now.... so i guess i'll do a traceroute lmao....
They just now confirmed they fixed it. Hopefully your disconnection is just temporary from the traffic cutting back over.
Still cannot log in to the game
Yeah we're seeing the same symptoms again. Reaching out to Comcast again.
Godspeed You! Bark Emperor
Thank you for helping us out!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=Bark Wahlberg,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=R9W03baQ,comment-id=00290001000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-17T19:24:18.839+0000)
>
> They just now confirmed they fixed it. Hopefully your disconnection is just temporary from the traffic cutting back over.

Still not working for me, do I need to uninstall/reinstall?

Ok yeah I just dcd in a game and now I can't do anything

Same this is happening to me, but my buddy about 14hrs away from me is logged in and fine?!?!
East Coast thing maybe?
West coast here and having the same issues so nay

Someone just posted about them having comcast as well as being int he same region and having the problem, but I sincerely doubt it was that.... but why can my friend on the other side of the country play and not I?
I don't know much about internet or anything along the technical aspects, but I do have comcast as well.
I also have comcast
Shit i have comcast too...
What Internet provider is everyone using?  Cause I have comcast.....

i posted about it, but my origional post was removed because i put it in the wrong board. so i came to see that i am not the only one having issues. Is it this message? 

"Connection Error:
Connection Failure: Unable to connect to PVP.net server.

Information regarding what may have caused this error cab be found here

Service availability can be viewed on the League Of Legends web page."
I can't login and I'm on the east coast, so maybe.
yeah i'm east coast too actually now that you mention it... spooky

> [{quoted}](name=Miss Malice,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=R9W03baQ,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2015-11-17T16:57:27.881+0000)
>
> Same this is happening to me, but my buddy about 14hrs away from me is logged in and fine?!?!
> East Coast thing maybe?

Hi, so yeah happening to me too.  West coast.  Was not logged in at all and still can't log in right now.

Wait it out I guess?  Although I notice this was 11 hours ago. :/
i'm down right now, thats that bull shit riot
Same problem.  I was in the middle of a game, disconnected, and now I can't relog into the client.  I even did a client repair to see if that'd solve anything.  Nope.
I also did a client repair and nothing is happening.
Myself, my duo partner and the enemy Jinx are all having that issue too. It's a promotion match for my partner. :\

tell your partner that i am deeply sorry for his or her situation, and if he or she loses the series because of it, post on boards, link it here, and i'll post it on a fb group i'm in. super not cool if they lose a series because the servers crashed

Yup counted as a loss: http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2012535577/40308189

I lost 20 LP, and he got his first loss for his promotion match. I'm confident we can win the other two, but that's ridiculous.

> [{quoted}](name=Asyrix,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=R9W03baQ,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2015-11-17T16:44:03.605+0000)

WOW me too man :( me too
http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=vivaolives
same here, dc'd and I can't even login now

the server status says NA servers are online....maybe its just us? {{item:3070}}

although it seems EUW servers are having a rough time

Its a possibility they just havent announced the problem yet. From what i can tell half of us are fine and the other half are not. So maybe they are trying to figure it out before they say the servers are down.
Same here, on NA,
i just froze in champ select, forcing me to exit out even though it said i would be dodging. now i cant log back in either
Ok... so nothing is going to be done about the game loses that occurred during this.... I'm done.
A notice of issues going on would have been nice, but a leave works fine  i guess
It's pretty weak that they aren't turning on loss prevented like EU WEST, i think it's pretty sus that a lot of NA users are being dropped and no one at riot notices

i sent a ticket and tweeted at them haha at this point i'm like w/e cause i was in normals, it's just a bummer cause wow is down all day for maintenance so i was gonna actually play league all day for once and now i can't

And it cost my team the game I was the most fed person. What the hell man come on.


http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2012534087/205272821?tab=overview

Looks like I also got a loss, as the only one on either team to suffer the problem:

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2012526501/37972956?tab=overview

I got into a game the in loading screen got an error saying "cant connect to servers, check your internet connection and retry" and wouldn't let me get in. Now i cant even log in to the game. Way to go riot, now im going to  get reported by my teammates for something i have no control over
Thank god I thought it was just me. Rito pls
